channel.title: Need help for my .run file
channel.description:
I have windows 7 and my run doesnt work for my friends server( the client ). I need a run code or something.
@echo off java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit
that is what mine is right now. It just opens and closes the command prompt really quick. Can someone help me :confused:
My java is in program files (x86) and I have jdk 1.5.0_22 and jre 1.6.0_22

item.title: Need help for my .run file
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

[quote=“dillktm65, post:2, topic:400735”]maybe

@echo off
title Client
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause[/quote]
That except for the “30 0 lowmem members 32” (but it doesn’t really matter)

Read full topic
